summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1966, for the improvement of 1st Avenue South from the intersection of Atlantic Street to Stacey Street all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with vitrified brick, asphalt, stone or wood blocks, laid upon a proper concrete foundation, with granite curbs, under Ordinance No. 20371 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
